columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the equipment group that equipment group obstruction is being defined for. Obstructions allow you to configure equipment groups that do not have a uniform rectangular cross-section. For example, there may be support pillars and other vertical objects going from floor to ceiling, or refrigeration units that are boxes on a wall, or tire wells. Obstructions can be specified for the entire equipment (compartment 0) or for individual compartments.

columns.name: COMPARTMENT_NUM
columns.description: The equipment compartment number for which the obstruction is being defined.

columns.name: OBSTRUCTION_NUM
columns.description: Number identifier for the obstruction.

columns.name: OBSTRUCTION_NAME
columns.description: Name given to obstruction.

columns.name: START_LENGTH_POSITION
columns.description: The start length position coordinate for the obstruction. The starting coordinate is from the forward left corner of the truck.

columns.name: START_LENGTH_POSITION_BASE
columns.description: The start length position in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: START_WIDTH_POSITION
columns.description: The start width position coordinate for the obstruction. The starting coordinate is from the forward left corner of the truck.

columns.name: START_WIDTH_POSITION_BASE
columns.description: The start width position in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: START_HEIGHT_POSITION
columns.description: The start height position coordinate for the obstruction. The starting coordinate is from the forward left corner of the truck.

columns.name: START_HEIGHT_POSITION_BASE
columns.description: The start height position in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: OBSTR_LENGTH
columns.description: The length of the obstruction.

columns.name: OBSTR_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: OBSTR_WIDTH
columns.description: The width of the obstruction.

columns.name: OBSTR_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The width in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: OBSTR_HEIGHT
columns.description: The height coordinate for the obstruction.

columns.name: OBSTR_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: START_LENGTH_POSITION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The start length position unit of measure.

columns.name: START_WIDTH_POSITION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The start width position unit of measure.

columns.name: START_HEIGHT_POSITION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The start height position unit of measure.

columns.name: OBSTR_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The obstruction length unit of measure.

columns.name: OBSTR_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The obstruction width unit of measure.

columns.name: OBSTR_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The obstruction height unit of measure.
